segments.text: I notice the boy climbing on that wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far, and the stool looks like it’s about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for him to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she looks while he’s about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely focused on drying that plate, not even looking up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spilling everywhere, and she doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to slip any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is turning into a mess, and no one is doing anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll realize what’s happening before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just chaos in the making.
segments.speaker: PAR
